channel.title: Plugins on Camel Dashboard Operator
channel.description: Recent content in Plugins on Camel Dashboard Operator

item.title: Camel Openshift Console Plugin
item.description:
This operator can work standalone and you can use the data exposed in the CamelApp custom resource accordingly. However it has a great fit with the Camel Openshift Console Plugin, which is a visual representation of the services exposed by the operator.

Camel Openshift Console Plugin dependencies matrix

The Camel Openshift Console Plugin is an extension of OpenShift Console exposing the data from the Camel Dashboard Operator.

Below you can find the compatibility list for its dependencies:
